verses.verse: וַיִּתְחַתֵּ֣ן <S%H2859><s%> made affinity שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> with Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's וַיְבִיאֶ֙הָ֙ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> her into the city דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> of David עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until כַּלֹּת֗וֹ <S%H3615><s%> until he had made an end לִבְנ֤וֹת <S%H1129><s%> of building אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> his own house וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חוֹמַ֥ת <S%H2346><s%> and the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> Only the people מְזַבְּחִ֖ים <S%H2076><s%> sacrificed בַּבָּמ֑וֹת <S%H1116><s%> in high places כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no נִבְנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> built בַ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> because there was no house לְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> unto the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַיָּמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> until those days הָהֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> those פ

וַיֶּאֱהַ֤ב <S%H157><s%> loved שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לָלֶ֕כֶת <S%H1980><s%> walking בְּחֻקּ֖וֹת <S%H2708><s%> in the statutes דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but בַּבָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> in high places ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מְזַבֵּ֖חַ <S%H2076><s%> only he sacrificed וּמַקְטִֽיר׃ <S%H6999><s%> and burnt incense

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king גִּבְעֹ֙נָה֙ <S%H1391><s%> to Gibeon לִזְבֹּ֣חַ <S%H2076><s%> to sacrifice שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> there for that הַבָּמָ֣ה <S%H1116><s%> high place הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> [was] the great אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand עֹלוֹת֙ <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> offer שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> did Solomon עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֥חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon that altar הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

בְּגִבְע֗וֹן <S%H1391><s%> In Gibeon נִרְאָ֧ה <S%H7200><s%> appeared יְהֹוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon בַּחֲל֣וֹם <S%H2472><s%> in a dream הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> and God שְׁאַ֖ל <S%H7592><s%> Ask מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> what I shall give לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> You עָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> Thou hast shewed עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> toward עַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant דָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David אָבִי֮ <S%H1><s%> my father חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy גָּדוֹל֒ <S%H1419><s%> great כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> he הָלַ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> according as he walked לְפָנֶ֜יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before בֶּאֱמֶ֧ת <S%H571><s%> thee in truth וּבִצְדָקָ֛ה <S%H6666><s%> and in righteousness וּבְיִשְׁרַ֥ת <S%H3483><s%> and in uprightness לֵבָ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> of heart עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> toward וַתִּשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> with thee and thou hast kept ל֗וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֶ֤סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> for him this great הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַתִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> that thou hast given ל֥וֹ בֵ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> him a son יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> to sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסְא֖וֹ <S%H3678><s%> on his throne כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And now O LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <S%H430><s%> my God אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> You הִמְלַ֣כְתָּ <S%H4427><s%> king אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> thou hast made thy servant תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> place דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> instead of David אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> my father וְאָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I נַ֣עַר <S%H5288><s%> child קָטֹ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> and I [am but] a little לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אֵדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> I know צֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> not [how] to go out וָבֹֽא׃ <S%H935><s%> or come in

וְעַ֨בְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> And thy servant בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [is] in the midst עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּחָ֑רְתָּ <S%H977><s%> which thou hast chosen עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֕ב <S%H7227><s%> a great אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִמָּנֶ֛ה <S%H4487><s%> that cannot be numbered וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יִסָּפֵ֖ר <S%H5608><s%> nor counted מֵרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude

וְנָתַתָּ֨ <S%H5414><s%> Give לְעַבְדְּךָ֜ <S%H5650><s%> therefore thy servant לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> heart שֹׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> an understanding לִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> to judge אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> thy people לְהָבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> that I may discern בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> between good לְרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> and bad כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who יוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> for who is able לִשְׁפֹּ֔ט <S%H8199><s%> to judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמְּךָ֥ <S%H5971><s%> people הַכָּבֵ֖ד <S%H3515><s%> this thy so great הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיִּיטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> pleasing הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> And the speech בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> the sight אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> the Lord כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> had asked שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> that Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about יַעַן֩ <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you שָׁאַ֜לְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> unto him Because thou hast asked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁאַ֨לְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> and hast not asked לְּךָ֜ יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> life רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> for thyself long וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁאַ֤לְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> neither hast asked לְּךָ֙ עֹ֔שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> riches וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁאַ֖לְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> for thyself nor hast asked נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the life אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> of thine enemies וְשָׁאַ֧לְתָּ <S%H7592><s%> but hast asked לְּךָ֛ הָבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> for thyself understanding לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> to discern מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> Behold I have done כִּדְבָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H1697><s%> according to thy words הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> lo I have given לְךָ֗ לֵ֚ב <S%H3820><s%> heart חָכָ֣ם <S%H2450><s%> thee a wise וְנָב֔וֹן <S%H995><s%> and an understanding אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> so כָּמ֙וֹךָ֙ <S%H3644><s%> like לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> has been לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> so that there was none like thee before וְאַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> thee neither after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> thee shall any arise כָּמֽוֹךָ׃ <S%H3644><s%> like

וְגַ֨ם <S%H1571><s%> have also אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> what לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁאַ֙לְתָּ֙ <S%H7592><s%> thee that which thou hast not asked נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> And I have also given לָ֔ךְ גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both עֹ֖שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> both riches גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> have also כָּב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and honour אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> so לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָמ֥וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> so that there shall not be any בַּמְּלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> among the kings כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3117><s%> like unto thee all thy days

וְאִ֣ם ׀ <S%H518><s%> If תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> did walk בִּדְרָכַ֗י <S%H1870><s%> in my ways לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep חֻקַּי֙ <S%H2706><s%> my statutes וּמִצְוֹתַ֔י <S%H4687><s%> and my commandments כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הָלַ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> David אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> as thy father וְהַאַרַכְתִּ֖י <S%H748><s%> then I will lengthen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָמֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3117><s%> thy days ס

וַיִּקַ֥ץ <S%H3364><s%> awoke שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold חֲל֑וֹם <S%H2472><s%> and behold [it was] a dream וַיָּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> And he came יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֣ד ׀ <S%H5975><s%> and stood לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord וַיַּ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> and offered up עֹלוֹת֙ <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and offered שְׁלָמִ֔ים <S%H8002><s%> peace offerings וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and made מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H4960><s%> a feast לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> to all his servants פ

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then תָּבֹ֗אנָה <S%H935><s%> Then came שְׁתַּ֛יִם <S%H8147><s%> there two נָשִׁ֥ים <S%H802><s%> women זֹנ֖וֹת <S%H2185><s%> armour אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖דְנָה <S%H5975><s%> and stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> woman הָֽאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> And the one בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> O אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> my lord אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I וְהָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> I and this woman הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> and I יֹשְׁבֹ֖ת <S%H3427><s%> dwell בְּבַ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> house אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> in one וָאֵלֵ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> and I was delivered of a child עִמָּ֖הּ <S%H5973><s%> while בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> with her in the house

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> happened בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> And it came to pass the third לְלִדְתִּ֔י <S%H3205><s%> after that I was delivered וַתֵּ֖לֶד <S%H3205><s%> was delivered גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> that this woman הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we יַחְדָּ֗ו <S%H3162><s%> also and we [were] together אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There זָ֤ר <S%H2114><s%> [there was] no stranger אִתָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H854><s%> in בַּבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> with us in the house זוּלָתִ֥י <S%H2108><s%> save שְׁתַּֽיִם־ <S%H8147><s%> we two אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> in the house

וַיָּ֛מָת <S%H4191><s%> died בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> child הָאִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> And this woman's הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> in לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> in the night אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> because שָׁכְבָ֖ה <S%H7901><s%> because she overlaid עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַתָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> And she arose בְּת֨וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> the middle הַלַּ֜יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> of the night וַתִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> my son מֵֽאֶצְלִ֗י <S%H681><s%> from beside וַאֲמָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H519><s%> me while thine handmaid יְשֵׁנָ֔ה <S%H3463><s%> slept וַתַּשְׁכִּיבֵ֖הוּ <S%H7901><s%> and laid בְּחֵיקָ֑הּ <S%H2436><s%> it in her bosom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנָ֥הּ <S%H1121><s%> child הַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> her dead הִשְׁכִּ֥יבָה <S%H7901><s%> and laid בְחֵיקִֽי׃ <S%H2436><s%> in my bosom

וָאָקֻ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> And when I rose בַּבֹּ֛קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning לְהֵינִ֥יק <S%H3243><s%> suck אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> to give my child וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> behold it was dead וָאֶתְבּוֹנֵ֤ן <S%H995><s%> but when I had considered אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> in בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> it in the morning וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> behold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> was not בְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> behold it was not my son אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָלָֽדְתִּי׃ <S%H3205><s%> which I did bear

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> woman הָאַחֶ֜רֶת <S%H312><s%> And the other לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No כִ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for בְּנִ֤י <S%H1121><s%> [is] my son הַחַי֙ <S%H2416><s%> Nay but the living וּבְנֵ֣ךְ <S%H1121><s%> [is] thy son הַמֵּ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> and the dead וְזֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֹמֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H559><s%> And this said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No כִ֔י <S%H3588><s%> one בְּנֵ֥ךְ <S%H1121><s%> [is] thy son הַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> No but the dead וּבְנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [is] my son הֶחָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> and the living וַתְּדַבֵּ֖רְנָה <S%H1696><s%> Thus they spake לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> The one אֹמֶ֔רֶת <S%H559><s%> saith זֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> the one בְּנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> This [is] my son הַחַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> that liveth וּבְנֵ֣ךְ <S%H1121><s%> and thy son הַמֵּ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> [is] the dead וְזֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> and the other אֹמֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H559><s%> saith לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No כִ֔י <S%H3588><s%> For בְּנֵ֥ךְ <S%H1121><s%> Nay but thy son הַמֵּ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> [is] the dead וּבְנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and my son הֶחָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> [is] the living פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king קְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> Bring לִי־ חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> me a sword וַיָּבִ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they brought הַחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king גִּזְר֛וּ <S%H1504><s%> Divide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיֶּ֥לֶד <S%H3206><s%> child הַחַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> the living לִשְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> in two וּתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> and give אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲצִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> half לְאַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> to the one וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> and half לְאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> to the other

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then spake הָאִשָּׁה֩ <S%H802><s%> the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose בְּנָ֨הּ <S%H1121><s%> child הַחַ֜י <S%H2416><s%> whose the living אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [was] unto the king כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִכְמְר֣וּ <S%H3648><s%> yearned רַחֲמֶיהָ֮ <S%H7356><s%> for her bowels עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּנָהּ֒ <S%H1121><s%> upon her son וַתֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> and she said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> O אֲדֹנִ֗י <S%H113><s%> my lord תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> give לָהּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּל֣וּד <S%H3205><s%> child הַחַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> her the living וְהָמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> and in no wise אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no תְּמִיתֻ֑הוּ <S%H4191><s%> slay וְזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֹמֶ֗רֶת <S%H559><s%> it But the other said גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again לִ֥י גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again לָ֛ךְ לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yours גְּזֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H1504><s%> Let it be neither mine nor thine [but] divide

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לָהּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּל֣וּד <S%H3205><s%> child הַחַ֔י <S%H2416><s%> her the living וְהָמֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> and in no wise לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no תְמִיתֻ֑הוּ <S%H4191><s%> slay הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> She אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> it she [is] the mother

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> And all Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> of the judgment אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁפַ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> had judged הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which the king וַיִּֽרְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> and they feared מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the king הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> for they saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that חָכְמַ֧ת <S%H2451><s%> that the wisdom אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God בְּקִרְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7130><s%> [was] in him לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment ס
